name: Krookodile
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

abilities.name: Black Eyes
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.
